mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_person_info ( party_id, person_name, sex_type_code, birth_date, marital_type_code, person_memo, created_by, created_date, updated_by, updated_date ) VALUES ( #{partyId, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{personName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sexTypeCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birthDate, jdbcType=DATE}, #{maritalTypeCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{personMemo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdBy, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createdDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedBy, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updatedDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )

( #{item.partyId, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.personName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.sexTypeCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.birthDate, jdbcType=DATE}, #{item.maritalTypeCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.personMemo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createdBy, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.createdDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.updatedBy, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.updatedDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE t_person_info SET person_name = #{personName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex_type_code = #{sexTypeCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, birth_date = #{birthDate, jdbcType=DATE}, marital_type_code = #{maritalTypeCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, person_memo = #{personMemo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_by = #{createdBy, jdbcType=BIGINT}, created_date = #{createdDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_by = #{updatedBy, jdbcType=BIGINT}, updated_date = #{updatedDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} WHERE
AND party_id = #{partyId, jdbcType=BIGINT}

SELECT
FROM t_person_info a WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.party_id = #{partyId, jdbcType=BIGINT}
